<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.RetrieveEmailScript</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>RetrieveEmailScript</name><script><![CDATA[var RetrieveEmailScript = Class.create();
RetrieveEmailScript.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getEmail: function() {
        var name = this.getParameter('sysparm_name_value'); // Get the selected name passed from the client-side script
        var email = ''; // Initialize email variable

        // Logic to retrieve the email address associated with the selected name
        // This could involve querying the appropriate table (e.g., User table) to fetch the email address

        return email; // Return the retrieved email address to the client-side script
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-20 06:40:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>f7a6319d9352c21094e3f15a7bba10a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RetrieveEmailScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f7a6319d9352c21094e3f15a7bba10a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-20 06:56:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
